latencyWarning.title: High Latency Detected
latencyWarning.description: Connection latency is elevated ({{latency}}ms). Performance may be affected.

latencyCritical.title: Connection Very Slow
latencyCritical.description: Latency is critically high ({{latency}}ms). Connection quality is severely degraded.

latencyRecovered.title: Connection Improved
latencyRecovered.description: Latency has returned to normal levels.

connectionLost.title: Connection Lost
connectionLost.description: Unable to reach the mixnet. Attempting to reconnect...

connectionDegraded.title: Connection Degraded
connectionDegraded.description: Some services are unavailable. Core functionality may be limited.

connectionAlerts.title: Connection Quality Alerts
connectionAlerts.description: Configure when to receive performance notifications
connectionAlerts.enableDesc: Show notifications when connection quality degrades
connectionAlerts.pushDesc: Receive alerts even when app is in background
connectionAlerts.soundDesc: Play a sound when alerts trigger
connectionAlerts.latencyWarningDesc: Show warning when latency exceeds this value
connectionAlerts.latencyCriticalDesc: Show critical alert when latency exceeds this value
connectionAlerts.degradedDurationDesc: Wait this long before alerting about degraded connection

history.title: Alert History
history.description: Recent connection quality alerts for debugging
history.emptyDesc: Alerts will appear here when connection issues occur
history.emailOpenedDesc: Complete your support request in your email app
history.exportedDesc: Alert history saved as JSON file
history.clearedDesc: All alert history has been removed

networkStats.title: Network Statistics
networkStats.description: Speed test history and latency trends
networkStats.runFirstTest: Run a test to see your mixnet performance
networkStats.disclaimer: Simulated results — actual mixnet speeds vary based on network conditions

termsUseBody: Privxx is provided to help reduce metadata exposure. You agree to use the app responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
termsNoGuaranteesBody: Privxx does not promise perfect or absolute anonymity. Availability and performance may vary, especially during preview mode.
termsPrivacyBody: Privxx does not track users or sell personal data. For details, see the Privacy Policy.
termsChangesBody: We may update these terms as the product evolves. Continued use means you accept the updated terms.
termsContactBody: If you have questions about these terms, please contact the Privxx team.
subtitle: Private Browsing & Payments Tunnel
privacyDrawerIntro: Privxx helps reduce metadata exposure — such as IP address, location, and timing — when you browse or interact online.
privacyDrawerIntroPreview: This preview shows how private routing will feel once fully enabled.
privacySectionDesignedPoint1: reduce metadata correlation across your activity
privacySectionDesignedPoint2: make private routing feel simple and familiar
privacySectionNotPoint2: change how you normally browse or use the web
privacySectionStatusText: This version demonstrates the interface and connection flow. Full cryptographic routing via the XX Network mixnet will be integrated next.
proxyPlaceholder: Private content will appear here once routing is fully enabled.
demoModeNotice: Preview — Backend live, messaging coming soon
connectionTimeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
inboxEmptyBody: Messaging will appear here once enabled.
offlineBody: Privxx cannot reach the backend right now. Please try again.
bridgeUnreachableDesc: Unable to connect to the bridge API. Check if the bridge server is running.

bridgeWarning.title: Bridge Unreachable
bridgeWarning.description: Unable to connect to the privacy bridge. Your connection is not protected.
bridgeWarning.tlsNotConfigured: TLS certificate not configured on server
bridgeWarning.dnsNotResolved: Domain DNS not pointing to server

connectionPath.title: Connection Path
connectionPath.description: Logical connection layers — no raw infrastructure exposed
connectionPath.proxyExplanation: Public entry point is unreachable. Check DNS, deployment, or SSL configuration.
connectionPath.bridgeExplanation: Security boundary isn't reachable. Check bridge service status and tunnel configuration.
connectionPath.xxdkExplanation: Private client reported an error. Identity or network initialization may have failed.
connectionPath.xxdkStarting: Private client is initializing — this is expected during startup.
diagnostics.noSignals: Diagnostic only. No signals are sent or stored by this panel.
diagnostics.jwtMissing: Logged in but no token found. Try refreshing.
diagnostics.notLoggedIn: Sign in to generate a JWT token.
eventsWillAppear: Events will appear as the bridge is queried
identityUnlockDescription: Enter your password to unlock your private identity.
browserHint: Enter a URL to route through the Privxx tunnel (Preview).
unlockToAccess: Unlock your identity to access the browser tunnel.
tunnelDemoNote: This is a simulated tunnel demo. Real cMixx routing will be enabled in a future update.
browserPreviewNote: Proxied content will appear here in a future version.
browserDemoNote: This is a preview of the Privxx tunnel flow. Real cMixx routing will be enabled in a future release.
inboxLockedBody: Unlock your identity to view messages
destinationHint: Enter a merchant URL or payment destination (Preview).
paymentsDemoNote: This is a preview flow. Live settlement will be enabled once the bridge supports payments.

payments.privacyDescription: Your browser never talks directly to payment providers. Intents are routed through the Bridge for private execution.
payments.statusNote: Intent capture is active. Private execution will be enabled once the Bridge supports payment rails.

paymentIntent.title: Payment Intent (Preview)
paymentIntent.disclaimer: Diagnostic preview only. No payment is created or sent.

installAppDescription: Add to home screen for quick access
installAppDescriptionIOS: Install Privxx on your home screen for quick access.
iosInstallTitle: Add Privxx to your Home Screen
iosInstallStep1: Tap the Share button in Safari
iosInstallStep2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
errorConnectionFailed: Unable to establish a private route right now.
privacyPolicyIntroText: Privxx is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how our application handles information when you use Privxx. Summary: Privxx does not collect, store, or share your personal data.
privacyPolicyNoCollectIntro: Privxx is designed with privacy as a core principle. We do not collect:
privacyPolicyLocalText: Privxx may store language preference on your device during your session. This information is never transmitted to our servers or any third party and is cleared when you close the app.
privacyPolicyThirdPartyText: Privxx does not integrate with analytics services, advertising networks, social media platforms, or third-party tracking tools.
privacyPolicyChildrenText: Privxx does not knowingly collect information from children. The app does not require account creation or personal information.
privacyPolicyChangesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be reflected by updating the effective date above.
releaseV01Summary: Privxx has transitioned from Preview to Live Backend mode, connecting to the production backend through a secure, same-origin proxy.
releaseLive1: Backend connectivity enabled with secure proxy
releaseLive2: Real backend health and status reporting
releaseLive4: PWA installation for mobile and desktop
releasePrivacyIntro: Privxx remains committed to privacy-first design:
releasePrivacy2: No cookies or local storage of user data
editProfileDesc: Change your display name and avatar
sessionSettingsDescription: Configure how long you stay logged in when inactive
sessionTimeoutHelp: You'll be automatically logged out after this period of inactivity for security.
notificationsDesc: Choose which notifications you want to receive
sessionWarningsDesc: Get warned before your session expires
connectionUpdatesDesc: Get notified when tunnel connection status changes
notificationSettingSaved: Your notification setting has been saved.
failedToUpdatePreference: Failed to update preference. Please try again.
alertSettingsDesc: Control sound and vibration for session warnings
soundAlertsDesc: Play audio tone for session expiry warnings
vibrationAlertsDesc: Vibrate device for session expiry warnings
vibrationNotSupported: Vibration not supported on this device
passkeysDescription: Use Touch ID, Face ID, Windows Hello, or security keys to sign in without a password.
passkeyDeviceNote: Passkeys are registered per device and browser profile. You'll need to add a passkey on each device you use.
platformAuthenticator: Device (Touch ID / Face ID / Windows Hello)
webauthnNotSupported: Passkeys are not supported in this browser.
addPasskeyHint: Add a passkey for passwordless sign-in
deletePasskeyWarning: This passkey will be removed and you won't be able to use it to sign in anymore. This action cannot be undone.
twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security using an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
twoFactorNotEnabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled. Enable it to add an extra layer of security to your account.
setup2FADescription: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app, or enter the secret key manually.
backupCodesDescription: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
disable2FAWarning: Enter your current 2FA code to disable two-factor authentication. This will make your account less secure.
componentDocsDesc: Usage examples and prop types for all components
selectComponent: Select a component to view its documentation
diagnostics.pageDescription: Monitor system health and translation status
diagnostics.translationStatusDesc: Sync status of all language files
diagnostics.qualityExplanation: Percentage of keys with actual translations (not placeholders). Sync completion ignores placeholders.
diagnostics.parseErrorHint: Check for syntax errors like extra braces, missing commas, or invalid characters.
diagnostics.healthScoreDesc: Overall system status and service availability
security.title: Security Dashboard
security.subtitle: Monitor and review security activity
security.dashboardDesc: View audit logs and security activity
security.eventTrendsDescription: Security events over the last 14 days
diagnostics.browserAnomalyDesc: Browser signal analysis for anomaly detection (diagnostic only)
diagnostics.browserAnomalyPrivacy: Diagnostic only. No signals are sent or stored. This data never leaves your browser.
diagnostics.policyPrivacy: Diagnostic only. No enforcement is applied. Always returns "allow" in Phase-2.
connectionTimeline.title: Connection History

authErrors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to authentication service
authErrors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
authErrors.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
authErrors.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked. Please try again later.
authErrors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
authErrors.passkeyNotSupported: Passkeys are not supported in this browser
authErrors.platformAuthUnavailable: Biometric authentication not available on this device

debugBundle.title: Auth Debug Bundle
debugBundle.description: Capture detailed error bodies and HTTP status codes
debugBundle.errorsDetected: Some services returned errors — see full bundle for details

backendStatus.title: Backend Status
backendStatus.subtitle: Reachable vs auth-required vs blocked
backendStatus.authRequiredDesc: Auth Required — Function reachable but needs authentication (401/403)
backendStatus.blockedDesc: Blocked/Error — CORS issue or server error

passkey.setupRecommendedDesc: Set up a passkey for faster sign-in and stronger account protection.
passkey.discoverableHint: Just tap the button below to sign in with your passkey.
passkey.setupFailed: Failed to set up passkey. You can try again later in Settings.
passkey.description: Use Touch ID, Face ID, Windows Hello, or a security key
passkey.emailOptionalHint: Leave blank to choose a passkey from this device.
passkey.onboardingDesc: Sign in faster and more securely with Touch ID, Face ID, or Windows Hello.

passkeyFlow.title: Passkey Setup Guide
passkeyFlow.intro: Follow these steps to set up passwordless sign-in with passkeys:
passkeyFlow.step1Desc: You must be logged in to register a passkey.
passkeyFlow.step2Desc: Use the 'Add Passkey' button above to register Touch ID, Face ID, or a security key.
passkeyFlow.step3Desc: Log out of your account to test passkey sign-in.
passkeyFlow.step4Desc: On the login page, use the Passkey tab to sign in passwordlessly.
passkeyFlow.deviceNote: Passkeys are registered per device and browser. You'll need to repeat this process on each device you want to use.

recoveryCodes.title: Recovery Codes
recoveryCodes.description: Use these codes if you lose access to your authenticator app.
recoveryCodes.warningBody: Each code can only be used once. Store them in a secure location like a password manager.
recoveryCodes.regenerateNote: Regenerating codes will invalidate all previous codes.
recoveryCodes.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate all your existing backup codes. You'll need to save the new codes immediately.
recoveryCodes.newCodesDesc: These codes replace all previous backup codes. Save them now — you won't see them again.

securityChecklist.title: Security Checklist
securityChecklist.emailVerifiedDesc: Your email address has been confirmed
securityChecklist.emailVerifiedWarn: Check your inbox for verification email
securityChecklist.twoFactorDesc: Extra security layer for your account
securityChecklist.passkeysWarn: Add a passkey for passwordless sign-in
securityChecklist.backendNote: Settings like 'Leaked Password Protection' are configured in the backend panel and cannot be checked from the app.

securityScore.title: Security Score
securityScore.description: Based on your account security settings

shareQrHint: Share this QR code so others can message you
recipientLengthError: Recipient ID must be exactly 44 characters
recipientFormatError: Invalid format: must be base64 ending with '='
recipientIdHint: cMixx ID: 44-character base64 string ending with '='
